content: I saw that in my PR. I did a quick search on the web and I found nothing except messages in this chat. Is this a name that we made up because naming is one of the hardest problems in computer science?
I mean if I use my imagination I can understand why the thing is named that way... so the name is quite descriptive actually.

Stuart Presnell said:

pincer_recursion is just a name I made up for this. Does anyone know if this is already known by another name? Or can anyone suggest a better name for this?
